        print("There are two roots: %f an d %f" % (x, y))

        roots = 1
        x = (-b) / 2*a
        print("There is 1 root: ", x)

        roots = 0
        print("No Roots, Disctiminant is less than 0.")

    system('cls')
    cel = float(input("Enter Temperature in Celsius: "))
    f = (cel * 9/5) + 32;
